The EDB Postgres Advanced Server (Advanced Server) documentation describes the latest version of Advanced Server 13 including minor releases and patches. The release notes in this section provide information on what was new in each release. For new functionality introduced after 13 in a minor or patch release, there are also indicators within the content about what release introduced the feature.

| Version | Release Date | Upstream Merges | 
| ------- | ------------ | --------------- | 
| 13.4.9  | 11 Nov 2021  | [13.5](https://www.postgresql.org/about/news/postgresql-141-135-129-1114-1019-and-9624-released-2349/) | 
| 13.4.8  | 28 Sep 2021  | [ 13.4](https://www.postgresql.org/about/news/postgresql-134-128-1113-1018-9623-and-14-beta-3-released-2277/) | 
| ... | | |
| [13.0.0](20_epas13_rel_notes) | 12 Dec 2020 | [13](hhttps://www.postgresql.org/docs/13/release-13.html) |
